reference.title: strcoll : locale specific character string compare

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: #include <string.h> int strcoll(const char *stra, const char * strb);

section.title: Description
section.p: strcoll compares the string pointed to by stra to the string pointed to by strb, using an interpretation appropriate to the current LC_COLLATE state.

section.title: Returns
section.p: If the first string is greater than the second string, strcoll returns a number greater than zero. If the two strings are equivalent, strcoll returns zero. If the first string is less than the second string, strcoll returns a number less than zero.
